Verses: 1 appozhudhu Leviyarin Vamsap Pidhaakkalin Thalaivar; Kaanaan Dhesaththilirukkira Seelovile Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaaridaththilum, Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavidaniththilum, Isravel Puththirarudaiya Koththirap Pidhaakkalilulla Thalaivaridaththilum Serndhu Vandhu:
2 naangal Kudiyirukkum Pattanangalaiyum, Engal Mirugajeevangalukkaaga Velinilangalaiyum Engalukkuk Kodukkumpadi, Karththar Moseyaikkondu Kattalaiyittaare Endraargal.
3 karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadiye, Isravel Puththirar Thangal Sudhandharaththile Leviyarukkup Pattanangalaiyum Avaigalin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal.

4 kokaaththiyarin Vamsangalukku Seettu Vizhundhadhu; Andha Seettinpadi Leviyaril Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaararukku Yoodhaa Koththiraththilum, Simiyon Koththiraththilum, Penyameen Koththiraththilum Kidaiththa Pattanangal Padhinmoondru.
5 kokaaththin Matrappuththirarukku, Eppiraayeem Koththiraththin Vamsangalukkullum, Thaan Koththiraththilum Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththilum, Seettinaal Kidaiththa Pattanangal Paththu.

6 kerson Puththirarukku, Isakkaar Koththiraththin Vamsangalukkullum, Aaser Koththiraththilum, Napthali Koththiraththilum, Paasaanilirukkira Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththilum, Seettinaal Kidaiththa Pattanangal Padhinmoondru.
7 meraari Puththirarukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadiye, Rooban Koththiraththilum, Kaadh Koththiraththilum, Sepulon Koththiraththilum Kidaiththa Pattanangal Pannirandu.
8 indhap Pattanangalaiyum Avaigalin Velinilangalaiyum Isravel Puththirar,karththar Moseyaikkondu Kattalaiyittapadiye, Seettuppottu Leviyarukkuk Koduththaargal.
9 leviyin Kumaararil Mudhalaam Seettaippetra Kokaaththiyarin Vamsangalile Irukkira Aaronin Kumaararukku,
10 yoodhaa Puththirarin Koththiraththilum, Simiyon Puththirarin Koththiraththilum, Avargal Koduththavaigalum Perperaaga Sollappattavaigalumaana Pattanangalin Naamangalaavana:
11 yoodhaavin Malaiththesaththil Aanaakkin Thagappanaagiya Arpaavin Pattanamaana Ebironaiyum Adhai Soozhndha Velinilangalaiyum Avargalukkuk Koduththaargal.
12 pattanaththai Serndha Vayalgalaiyum Adhin Pattigalaiyum Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalebukkuk Kaaniyaatchiyaagak Koduththaargal.
13 ippadiye Kolai Seydhavanukku Adaikkalappattanamaaga Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaararukku Ebironaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Lipnaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
14 yaaththeeraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Esdhemovaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
15 olonaiyum Adhin Veli Nilangalaiyum, Thepeeraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
16 aayinaiyum Adhin Veli Nilangalaiyum, Yuththaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Pedhshimesaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Andha Irandu Koththirangalilirukkira Pattanangal Onbadhu.
17 penyameen Koththiraththile Avargalukkuk Kibiyonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Kepaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
18 aanadhoththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Almonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
19 aasaariyaraana Aaronudaiya Kumaararin Pattanangalellaam Avaigalin Velinilangalutpada Padhinmoondru.
20 leviyaraana Kokaaththin Puththiraril Meedhiyaana Avargaludaiya Matra Vamsangalukku Eppiraayeemin Koththiraththile Avargalukkup Panguveedhamaaga Avargal Koduththa Pattanangalaavana:
21 kolaiseydha Adaikkalappattanamaana Eppiraayeemin Malaiththesaththil Irukkira Seekemaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Keseraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
22 kipsaayeemaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Peththoronaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Avargalukkuk Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
23 thaan Koththiraththile Eldhekkeyaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Kipeththonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
24 aayalonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Kaadhrimmonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Avargalukkuk Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
25 manaaseyin Paadhik Koththiraththile Thaanaagaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Kaadhrimmonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Avargalukkuk Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Irandu.
26 kokaadh Puththirarin Meedhiyaana Vamsangalukku Undaana Pattanangalellaam Avaigalin Velinilangalutpada Paththu.

27 leviyarin Vamsangalile Kerson Puththirarukku Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththil Kolaiseydhavanukku Adaikkalap Pattanamaana Paasaanilulla Kolaanaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Peyesdhiraavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Irandu.
28 isakkaarin Koththiraththile Keesonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Thaaparaaththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
29 yarmooththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Enkanneemaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
30 aaserin Koththiraththile Mishayaalaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Apdhonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
31 elkaaththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Rekopaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.

32 napthali Koththiraththile Kolaiseydhavanukku Adaikkalappattanamaagak Kalileyaavilulla Kedhesaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Ammoththoraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Kardhaanaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Moondru.
33 kersoniyarukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Undaana Pattanangalellaam Avaigalin Velinilangalutpada Padhinmoondru.
34 matra Leviyaraagiya Meraari Puththirarin Vamsangalukku Sepulon Koththiraththile Yokniyaamaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Kardhaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
35 thimnaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Nagalaalaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
36 rooban Koththiraththile Peseraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Yaagasaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
37 kedhemoththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Mepaagaaththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
38 kaadh Koththiraththile Kolaiseydhavanukku Adaikkalap Pattanamaaga, Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Maknaayeemaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
39 esponaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Yaaseraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Indhap Pattanangal Naalu.
40 ivaigalellaam Leviyarin Matra Vamsangalaagiya Meraari Puththirarukku, Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Pattanangal; Avargaludaiya Panguveedham Pannirandu Pattanangal.
41 isravel Puththirarudaiya Kaaniyaatchiyin Naduvile Irukkira Leviyarin Pattanangalellaam Avaigalin Velinilangalutpada Naarpaththettu.
42 indhap Pattanangalil Ovvondrirkum Adhadhai Soozhndha Velinilangal Irundhadhu; Ellaappattanangalukkum Appadiye Irundhadhu.

43 indhap Pragaaramaagak Karththar Isravelukkuk Koduppen Endru Avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyitta Dhesaththaiyellaam Koduththaar; Avargal Avaigalai Sudhandhariththukkondu, Avaigalile Kudiyirundhaargal.

44 karththar Avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittapadiyellaam Avargalai Sutrilum Yuththamillaamal Ilaippaarappanninaar; Avargaludaiya Ellaa Saththurukkalilum Oruvarum Avargalukku Munbaaga Nirkavillai; Avargal Saththurukkalaiyellaam Karththar Avargal Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar.
45 karththar Isravel Kudumpaththaarukku Solliyirundha Nalvaarththaigalilellaam Oru Vaarththaiyum Thavarippogavillai; Ellaam Niraiveritru.
